p:
In the future, the expansion of the sacred ibis in Italian rice areas could be limited by the recent modality of rice cultivation with limited flooding periods
68 . In the last two decades, the water presence in paddy fields is becoming more and more limited. This circumstance could negatively affect the possibility of foraging on water environments for both herons and egrets of conservation concern
68, 69 , but for the invasive ibises too.
